We wanted the flywheel to reach a target velocity. We were wondering if we needed to account for a gear ratio anywhere in our code or when we tune the flywheel in SysID? We use Falcon 500 motors and its internal encoders. Our original thought was that we didnâ€™t need to account for the gear ratio because this is velocity, not position control, but we could be wrong.
